arts.ttl: 16 players missing from Tottenham vs Chelsea as Thomas Frank and Enzo Maresca suffer major blows
arts.sum: Tottenham Hotspur and Chelsea will both be without a number of players when they meet at the Tottenham Hotspur Stadium in the Premier League on Sunday, in the latest top flight London derby
